track.name: Body and Soul
comments: ONE OF THE ORIGINAL JAZZ MASTERS, BEAUTIFUL STUFF R I P HAWK
hawk & prez should be required listening...(2)
Coleman Hawkins and Lester Young should be required listening for everyone.
Just wonderful, a landmark piece of tenor, and those horns floating behind give it a lovely lift.
I feel my blood pressure dropping... this is just the balm I needed.
...this is the tenor ballad to be enclosed in the time capsule (2)
body and soul. what more do you want? And it's Coleman playing it for you.
LondonLouis wrote: Along with Bechet's Summertime, this is one of the great solo tracks from the 1930s. Always a joy to listen to....jazzy wrote: amen
a fine piece of work from hawk on a timeless classic of jazz.
all love and longing...the hawk soars...thanks for sharing your soul...undeniably beautiful...RIP
Sophisticated. Makes me feel smarter just listening.
Makes the notes Sooooo mellow - just rocks & played so many years ago but still appreciated
